Edges-Barbarian -- Male Human Heroic Barbarian
Attributes (13 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d6 Strength: d12 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility w/heavy armor or shield
Skills (20 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Fighting: (agi) d8 Persuasion: (spi) d4
Athletics: (agi) d6 Gambling: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d6 Spellcasting: (sma) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d6 Stealth: (agi) d4
Faith: (spi) d6 Performance: (spi) d4 Taunt: (sma) d6
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Auran; Celestial; Common
Skill Notes:
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility-based skills w/heavy armor or shield
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/Rolls Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Edge: 6; Skill: 8
Features
Edges (5 points): Barbarian; Danger Sense; Intimidating Glare; Powerful Blow; Strength Surge Hindrances: Cautious; One Eye+; Shamed Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Barbarian: Has Armor Restriction, Fast, and Rage features
Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting
Enraged: Ignores 2 points of wound penalties and all fatigue penalties
One Eye+: Suffers -2 on visual tasks 5" distant
Shamed: Past event causes self-doubt
Combat
Parry: 7 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 8/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Light Weapons: Dagger (d12+d4 R3"); Light Repeating Crossbow (2d6 R10"); Short Sword (d12+d6); Unarmed (d12+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fast: +2 Pace
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Strength Surge: Increased Fury effects
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Fury: +2 Strength step; every attack must be a Wild Attack
Intimidating Glare: May take free Intimidation action when Action card is jack or better
Powerful Blow: Wild Attack does +4 damage
Rage: Has Fury, Enraged, and Reckless Abandon features for 5 rd at will or when Shaken or wounded (Smarts neg); suffers 1 level of fatigue afterward until 1 hr rest
Reckless Abandon: Critical failure on attack hits random target or self
